1-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(mc.note) AS production_note, MIN(t.title) AS movie_title, MIN(t.production_year) AS movie_year
 FROM company_type AS ct,
 info_type AS it,
 movie_companies AS mc,
 movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
 title AS t
 WHERE ct.id = mc.company_type_id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND it.id = mi_idx.info_type_id
 AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
 AND it.info = 'rating'
 AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%production%'
 AND (mc.note LIKE '%a%' OR mc.note LIKE '%S%');

 FROM company_type AS ct,
 info_type AS it,
 movie_companies AS mc,
 movie_info_idx AS mi_idx,
 title AS t
 WHERE ct.id = mc.company_type_id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
 AND it.id = mi_idx.info_type_id
 AND ct.kind = 'distributors'
 AND it.info = 'votes distribution'
 AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%2010%'
 AND (mc.note LIKE '%with%' OR mc.note LIKE '%TV%');
